name: Adventures of ESI: Space thieves
description:
This is a retro 8-bit style platformer game. The game story happens in the great shattel. You have to jump, fight and kill enemies, collect gems and ammo and do many other things like oldies games.

System requirements

This game is designed to play with all systems (even low-end systems).minimum requirements are:

OS: Windows 7

RAM: 1GB

VGA: 128 MB

CPU: 1Ghz intel or AMD

I hope you enjoy playing!

-ESI
